description:
Welcome to BEHR Paint, where we believe in the power of color to transform spaces and lives. We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Vice President of Sales Coaching & Development to join our dynamic team. This individual will play a crucial role in driving the growth and success of our sales team through strategic coaching and development initiatives. As such, we are looking for a strong leader with a passion for mentorship, a proven track record in sales, and a deep understanding of the home improvement industry. If you are someone who thrives in a fast-paced, collaborative environment, and is driven by a desire to see others succeed, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity with BEHR Paint.
Develop and implement strategic coaching and development programs for the sales team to increase their effectiveness and drive sales growth.
Create and maintain a positive and inclusive team culture that fosters growth, learning, and collaboration.
Serve as a mentor and coach to sales team members, providing guidance and support to help them achieve their professional goals.
Conduct regular performance evaluations and provide constructive feedback to team members to improve their skills and performance.
Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to continuously improve the sales coaching and development programs.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as marketing and product development, to ensure alignment and consistency in sales strategies.
Develop and maintain training materials and resources to support the sales team's development.
Monitor and analyze sales data to identify areas for improvement and implement solutions to drive sales growth.
Lead and participate in sales meetings and training sessions to share best practices and provide updates on performance and goals.
Collaborate with HR to recruit, hire, and train new sales team members.
Build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, including customers, partners, and industry influencers.
Continuously evaluate and improve the sales coaching and development program to ensure it meets the changing needs of the sales team and the business.

BEHR Paint is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
